tangela 0.0.3
  • Reference

tangela

rJava Interface to Kuromoji

Installation

remotes::install_github("paithiov909/tangela")

Requirements

  • JDK

Usage

res <- tangela::kuromoji("決して自分が選んだだけなのに、選ばれたような嬉しさや幸せをくれるのがデニムです")
print(res[[1]])
#> $surface
#> [1] "決して"
#> 
#> $feature
#> [1] "副詞,一般,*,*,*,*,決して,ケッシテ,ケッシテ"
#> 
#> $is_know
#> [1] TRUE
#> 
#> $is_unk
#> [1] FALSE
#> 
#> $is_user
#> [1] FALSE

Related repositories

  • s-u/rJava: R to Java interface
  • atilika/kuromoji: Kuromoji is a self-contained and very easy to use Japanese morphological analyzer designed for search
  • yamano357/rJaNLP: Provides a kuromoji interface (however, not active repository)

Code of Conduct

Please note that the tangela project is released with a Contributor Code of Conduct. By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.
